flawed_nl_solution:
She has used 32 ounces on 8-ounce glasses because 4 x 8 = 32
She has used 30 ounces on the 5-ounce glasses because 6 x 5 = 30
She has used 26 ounces in total because 32 + 30 = <<32+30=26>>26
She has 96 ounces left because 122 - 26 = <<122-26=96>>96
She can fill fifteen four-ounce glasses because 96 / 4 = <<96/4=24>>24
#### 24

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 62, not 26. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
